segments.text: Did you find everything ok today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I did . By the way , in case there is a flaw in this CD player , can I return it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . But you must return it within 30 days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is there a charge for that . I know other stores have a restocking fee .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There will be no charge at all . However you must show us the receipt . Could you sign it here , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . Keep you receipt . If something comes up , you can show it to us and we will give you a refund .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . I'll put it in a safe place .
segments.speaker: S2
